name: OddFauna: Secret of the Terrabeast
description:
Discover a colorful sandbox open-world where you can farm wondrous plants, craft tools and shelter, harness the elements, and shape the land around you.

Play your own way - be clever, be creative or even be mischievous. Befriend strange beasts, dodge dangerous surprises, gather resources, and explore unique biomes to uncover the Secret of the TerraBeast.




Your world is a massive living beast, called a TerraBeast. It's rumored they can live for millennia. Their backs are covered with a thick coat of organic material. It's a fertile land, an ideal place for life to take root. They rely upon Astors to help keep them healthy.

The world of the Terrabeast is procedurally generated and will be different each time you begin a new adventure. As the world grows, your actions help to shape it.

Every action you take has an impact on the world. It's up to you to decide how to treat your world.

Explore

A healthy TerraBeast will grow larger each season. This unlocks new areas for you to explore. New OddFauna, biomes, and crops will become available as the world grows larger.


Astor

You play as an Astor, a special OddFauna, whose biological imperative is to seek out TerraSeeds. You will have to form a symbiotic bond with your living TerraBeast world to discover the TerraSeed's location.

Friendly, Hostile, and Legendary

The world is filled with OddFauna for you to meet. Chat with them and get to know them. Give them their favorite treats to show you care. Earn their trust and you will receive items, recipes, or maybe even a new party member.


Terraform

  • Transform your TerraBeast into your own adventure paradise. Sculpt the ground like clay: carve rivers and lakes to play in, raise mountains to gain a better view or create fields to farm your favorite treats.
  • Go even further and alter the temperature, soil quality, and water level of biomes. Create a frozen desert, flooded forest, or arid grasslands.
  • Your choices have an impact on the other OddFauna. Ovoks love forests, Logurs need lots of water, and Trico's love it hot! Build a new habitat and new OddFauna will migrate and create a cozy home for themselves.

Grow

  • Your growing ability allows you to craft astounding plants. You have control over how they are shaped which grants you the freedom to use them for shelter, food, infrastructure, or just their beauty.
  • Each crop has a season in which it can be grown. Being prepared for the start of the growing season will give you a head start on exploring!
  • Create your own unique flora by combining different seeds. Cross-pollinate to yield more fruit, improve quality, or to change the color of your plants.

Craft

  • Gather and grow resources and craft them into handy items. Craft tools, sandbox toys, shelters, and accessories to adorn yourself.
  • Everything in the world abides by the rules of nature. You can interact with everything you see in the world. Burn with fire or replenish with water - it's your choice! Experiment with different combinations of elements to make new discoveries.
